title: Cyber Pop Zoe loot shard greyed out?
body:
I just got Cyber Pop Zoe in a chest (lucky I know) 

But I cant activate it, the option is greyed out. 

It says 1050 orange essence to make permanent. I have 2354.

Edit: 

Now my clients saying there is a server side issue that's making it unable to patch. Servers look fine on the status page though. 

BroPoro Halp.

replies.body: Ahhhhhh it looks like you weren't able to redeem that skin shard because you had purchased the Zoe bundle that unlocked the skin as well. You already have the skin unlocked so you can't unlock it again XP!

Thats not possible :P I unlocked Zoe with BE.

EDit: looking at my purchase history it shows I got the bundle.. But I really didnt. haha

There may be a bug to look into here. I bought Zoe with BE, Then bought RP, then Bought Chests, which had the shard in it. 

I don't mind, because I was going to buy it anyways, but there is something strange here. Might be worth looking into.
